citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:27pm on
22-Dec-16.
There was no response to ringing the doorbell. I left a voice message at the licensee's number. There has been no
return call as of 6:12pm.
